view.inputhandler

Class KeyModifierHandler

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class KeyModifierHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    KeyModifierHandler class. Handles adding KeyModifier functionalty to InputHandler
    Author:
    groep 03

    • Method Detail

      • addKeyModifier

        public void addKeyModifier(int keyCode)
        Add a new KeyModifier to the list of active KeyModifiers if the key is valid. Also reset all KeyModifiers that are no longer active.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - the keyCode of the KeyModifier to add

      • getActiveKeyModifier

        public view.inputhandler.KeyModifierHandler.KeyModifierType getActiveKeyModifier()
        Get the KeyModifierType based on the active KeyModifier(s).
        Returns:
        the active KeyModifier's KeyModifierType
